# All Environment Variable Names

## Flask Configuration
PORT
FLASK_ENV
DOMAIN
SECRET_KEY

## AI Integration
OPENAI_API_KEY
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
GOOGLE_API_KEY

## Payment Processing (Stripe)
STRIPE_SECRET_KEY
STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET

## SMS Service (Twilio)
TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN
TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER

## Email Configuration
SMTP_SERVER
SMTP_PORT
SMTP_USERNAME
SMTP_PASSWORD

## Database
DATABASE_URL

## Spokeo API
SPOKEO_USERNAME
SPOKEO_PASSWORD
